title: Painting the word - Christian pictures and their Meanings (Art E
description:
Painting the Word. Christian Pictures and Their Meanings
Yale University Press | 2000 | English | 228 pages | PDF | 31.7 MB


Christianity is another country, says John Drury, and we need to familiarize ourselves with it in order to understand the universal meaning of its art. In this beautifully written book, Drury, an Anglican priest and theologian, looks at religious paintings through the ages and presents them to us in a fresh way-as works filled with passion, stones and meaning. They become the poetry of such eternal human concerns as birth, death, sacrifice, love and moral goodness and failure
